reviewText: Just fine - just what I wanted.

A good double feature deal. I, Robot, based on the Isaac Asimov story is a serious sci-fi in contrast to the more parody-style sci-fi of Independence Day. Oddly enough, the lead character in I, Robot shows more "attitude" than the lead character in comic Independence Day. Will Smith handles both roles well.
It's Will Smiff. If you don't love him you are probably a communist

I just wanted to be able to watch the films. I don't love them enough to buy it on Blu-Ray so it works for me.  However, it would have been better if i included a couple more films. Maybe, Wild Wild West, Hancock or Men in Black 1 & 2.
Double feature; I Robot, Independance Day. Both good movies, I really like him in Independance Day; he's funny. I recommend both of them. Josie
